    "file_path": "h2q_project/tests/test_quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import unittest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.quaternion_ops import quaternion_multiply, quaternion_conjugate, quaternion_magnitude, quaternion_normalize

class TestQuaternionOps(unittest.TestCase):

    def test_quaternion_multiply(self):
        q1 = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        q2 = np.array([5, 6, 7, 8])
        expected = np.array([-60, 12, 30, 24])
        result = quaternion_multiply(q1, q2)
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(result, expected))

    def test_quaternion_conjugate(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        expected = np.array([1, -2, -3, -4])
        result = quaternion_conjugate(q)
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(result, expected))

    def test_quaternion_magnitude(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        expected = np.sqrt(1 + 4 + 9 + 16)
        result = quaternion_magnitude(q)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(result, expected)

    def test_quaternion_normalize(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        magnitude = np.sqrt(1 + 4 + 9 + 16)
        expected = q / magnitude
        result = quaternion_normalize(q)
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(result, expected))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()"
  },

    "file_path": "h2q_project/tests/test_fractal_geometry.py",
    "content": "import unittest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.fractal_geometry import quaternion_julia_set

class TestFractalGeometry(unittest.TestCase):

    def test_quaternion_julia_set(self):
        # Define parameters for the Julia set calculation
        c = np.array([0.285 + 0j, 0.01 + 0j]) # Example complex constant c
        grid_size = 10
        iterations = 5

        # Call the function to generate the Julia set (simplified test)
        julia_set = quaternion_julia_set(c, grid_size, iterations)

        # Perform basic assertions to check if the output is as expected
        self.assertEqual(julia_set.shape, (grid_size, grid_size))
        self.assertTrue(np.all(julia_set >= 0))
        self.assertTrue(np.all(julia_set <= iterations))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()"
  }
]
